noun.name: toothbrush
noun.discription: a tool used for cleaning teeth

object1.name: hairbrush
object1.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for grooming hair

object2.name: nail brush
object2.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for cleaning nails

object3.name: dish brush
object3.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for scrubbing dishes

object4.name: toilet brush
object4.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for cleaning toilets

object5.name: paintbrush
object5.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for applying paint

object6.name: carpet brush
object6.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for cleaning carpets

object7.name: shoe brush
object7.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for cleaning shoes

object8.name: window brush
object8.discription: in parallel with 'toothbrush', is a tool used for cleaning windows
